variable.name: REXA1
variable.description: WHEN WAS LAST TIME DOCTOR SEEN? Q1
variable.comment: For further information, consult the document Exam 3 Retinal Exam.pdf.
variable.value: At least 1 year but less than 2 years
At least 2 years but less than 2 years
